title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5002.8 - Payment for previous service for Tier 6 members who are eligible to purchase such service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5002.8 - Payment for previous service for Tier 6 members who are eligible to purchase such service

State Regulations

The amount of money to be paid for previous service which
predates the member's date of membership in the case of Tier 6 members shall be
six percent of wages earned together with interest at the rate of five percent
per annum compounded annually from the date of such service through the date of
payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5002.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
